>
> 
> Continuing to guide the construction of the new body, Megatron X smi=
rked with satisfaction at the sound of the female's voice. "Soon, very soon=
, you shall stand tall before me. A body, fit and pure, made for your warri=
or spark." It would seem like mere moments later that the work was complete=
d. The work station slid aside, then the wall seperating the two Decepticon=
s slid the opposite way. Megatron X stepped forward to grasp the framework =
Holding Maxima in place, pulling it forward to allow her to take her first =
step into the lab.
> =A0
> The frame began to fall away, leaving her to sta=
nd on her own two feet before him.
> 
> 

Crimson optics flashed brightly t=
hen remained a continuous glow like burning embers. 
Moments following, her=
 legs moved to take her first step in this new body. What seemed wobbly at =
first now became strong without a doubt. First step landed with a heavy met=
allic thunk upon the floor. Followed by another as her other leg came up al=
ongside. 

Standing tall before Megatron X, a form ever so worthy of the ol=
d Decepticon. A tall, stout, and menacing form, albeit a femme, she wasn't =
the type to be fragile. Her fingers flexed as she glanced down at them. Not=
 long with claws as she use to have but that could be remedied. 
So.. now, =
she accessed her weapons. 
With a whir and hum, chunk and tink... her weapo=
ns formed and transformed from her arms and shoulders, even one cannon that=
 flipped down from her back to poke out from beside her waist. 

"Impressiv=
e," she chimed in with that sultry malicious deep femme voice. Her tone ref=
lected how pleased she was with this new form. And good ridence to the tech=
no-organic form. No self-respecting Cybertronian would be techno-organic. S=
he'll leave that to the horrifying experiments conducted by the Quintessons=
. 

Those crimson optics returned to Megatron X, looking at him, as a smile=
 curled upon her metallic lips. "The Decepticons... return." Her optics fla=
shed brightly once more.
